alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Harper; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 6:17PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Ellis, southeastern Harper and northwestern Woodward Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 616 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles north of Fort Supply to 9 miles southwest of Alabaster Caverns State Park. Movement was southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Supply and Alabaster Caverns State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If on or near Fort Supply Lake, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
